name: 凤凰网评论频道
css:
@-moz-document domain("comment.ifeng.com") {
 body {background-color:#f0f0f0 !important;}
 /*透明背景*/  
.nav,    
#username, 
#password,    
.main,
.right,
.blockR,
.RpicNews02,
.replyCon.bg,    
.current,
.next, 
#cmtcontentBottom,    
#cmtcontentRight ,
.chaFotNav02, 
.chaFooter
{background:none !important;} 
    
 /*隐藏内容*/ 
 .webZm.red,   
 .navLogo,   
 .chaFotNav,   
 IMG[src="images/logo.jpg"]   
{display:none !important;}
}
